H0.text: Positive is the electrical charge of the O₂ molecules formed when two atoms of oxygen combine to produce pure oxygen gas.

H1.text: Negative is the electrical charge of the O₂ molecules formed when two atoms of oxygen combine to produce pure oxygen gas.

H2.text: Neutral is the electrical charge of the O₂ molecules that result when two atoms of oxygen combine to form pure oxygen gas.

H3.text: Variable is the electrical charge of the O₂ molecules formed when two atoms of oxygen combine to produce pure oxygen gas.
